## data 
0000000000000000 00000000000000000000000000000001 // 1 row of the first matrix 
0000000000000001 00000000000000000000000000000010 // 2 col of the first matrix 
0000000000000010 00000000000000000000000000000010 // 2 row of the second matrix
0000000000000011 00000000000000000000000000000011 // 3 col of the second matrix 
0000000000000100 00000000000000000000000000000111 // 7 start of stack of matrix 1 
0000000000000101 00000000000000000000000000001001 // 9 start of stack of matrix 2 
0000000000000110 00000000000000000000000000000000 // 0 always zero at 6 
0000000000000111 00000000000000000000000000000001 // (0,0) 1 start of matrix 1 [let's do a 1x2]
0000000000001000 00000000000000000000000000000010 // (0,1) 2
0000000000001001 00000000000000000000000000000001 // (0,0) 1 start of second matrix [let's do a 2x3] 
0000000000001010 00000000000000000000000000000100 // (1,0) 4
0000000000001011 00000000000000000000000000000010 // (0,1) 2
0000000000001100 00000000000000000000000000000101 // (1,1) 5
0000000000001101 00000000000000000000000000000011 // (0,2) 3
0000000000001110 00000000000000000000000000000110 // (1,2) 6
## instructions
memory address  | instr: type + op + mode + im + regs/data
0010000011101011 00100101000000000000000000000000 //LDD R0 0 - row of first matrix

0010000011101101 00100101111000000000000000010000 //LDD R14 16 
0010000011101110 00101010000011100000000000000000 //STR R0 R14

0010000011110000 00101010000111100000000000000000 //STR R1 R14
0010000011110011 00100101001000000000000000000001 //LDD R2 1
0010000011110100 00100101111100000000000000000110 //LDD R15 6
0010000011110101 00100110001111110000000000000000 //LDD R3 R15

0010000011110111 00100110010111110000000000000000 //LDD R5 R15
0010000011111000 00100101110100000000000000000101 //LDD R13 6
0010000011111001 00100110011011010000000000000000 //LDD R6 R13
0010000011111010 00000000111010000000000000000001 //ADD R13 1
0010000011111011 00100101110000000000000000000111 //LDD R12 7
0010000011111100 00100110011111000000000000000000 //LDD R7 R12
0010000011111101 00000000111000000000000000000001 //ADD R12 1
0010000011111110 00100110100011110000000000000000 //LDD R8 R15
0010000011111111 00000100001110110000000000000000 //MUL R7 R6
0010000100000000 00000000010000111000000000000000 //ADD R8 R7
0010000100000001 00000000111100000000000000000001 //ADD R14 1
